stable.title: Tastic Mesh Firmware v0.0.5
stable.release_notes: Three board support! Added Heltec WiFi LoRa 32 V3. Includes firmware for nRF52840 devices (XIAO, Tracker) and ESP32-S3 devices (Heltec V3). Note: Web flasher shows one board at a time - select your device to get the appropriate firmware.
